section.name: Simple DHI Clients
section.p: In the edu.sc.seis.fissuresUtil.simple package are several simple clients that may help you in writing your own DHI client. There are three clients, one for each of the three main types of DHI servers. In each case, the clients make use of the existing codebase in fissuresUtil, fissuresImpl, fissuresIDL and SeedCodec, so you will need each of those jars in your classpath in order to run them.

subsection.name: Event
subsection.p: The source for the Simple Event client can be found here.

subsection.name: Network
subsection.p: The source for the Simple Network client can be found here.

subsection.name: Seismogram
subsection.p: The source for the Simple Seismogram client can be found here.
